This site contains material for Dr. Johnson's *Applied Regression Modeling* course (Stat 436/516) at the University of Idaho for the spring semester of 2023.

***

<center>

![](heteroscedasticity.jpg)

My little statistics parody of one of the variations of the cover of the album [Sychronicity](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Synchronicity_(The_Police_album)) by the [The Police](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Police) (apparently there were 36 variations of this album cover). 

</center>

***

If you are interested in seeing the [R Markdown](https://rmarkdown.rstudio.com) code I use to create this website and its contents, you can browse the [source files on GitHub](https://github.com/trobinj/stat516/tree/gh-pages). The source files have a .Rmd extension.
